posts.post_content: I am a new member here and I am looking buy and trade for Zack Wheat cards and other tobacco cards of Brooklyn Robins, Superbas, Nationals, etc. I have many references from the old beckett boards and can send first on trades. Please let me know what you have, thanks!

Greetings and welcome to the BST.

I have a PSA 3 T213-2 Wheat (Brooklyn) available for $400.  Please email me at [url]craig_w67217@yahoo.com[/url] if you're interested.

Best regards,
Craig

[IMG]http://i285.photobucket.com/albums/ll71/craigw67217/For%20Sale/T213-2Wheat.jpg[/IMG]

Have a T213-2 Wheat PSA 4 (Pop. 1 Highest Graded) for sale. Contact me at [url]donavonarabie@yahoo.com[/url]

[IMG][IMG]http://i416.photobucket.com/albums/pp241/gandhi081876/T213%20Coupons%20Type%202/1914T213-2ZachWheat.jpg[/IMG][/IMG]

Thanks,
Donavon

Let me know if you would like scans/prices:

SGC 20 Jordan
SGC 40 Bergen

thanks,
jim
To all, I think we have discussed these before. Thanks.
Thank you for another sale on this website! I am still looking for some rare Wheats!
Still looking guys. Please bring anything you have with a price!

[url]http://www.oldvintagebaseballcards.com[/url]  enter Wheat in the search and you will see what I have.
Marty
Thanks to all the guys who have responded. Still looking.
